Shipping takes 7-10 business days via USPS Priority, Express shipping is available ONLY after 3-5 day processing time. Please email shelbyglamhair@gmail.com to make arrangements.

~RUSSIAN~

This luxury hair is butter mash mellow soft, smooth and silky. It has high moisture retention level so you do not need to add any form of moisture to this hair. It may grease easily so we advise you wash at least once a week. This type of hair holds curls perfectly. You may only need to comb this hair once a day or once in two days because it lays perfectly undisturbed. The hair is single drawn, meaning it is at its natural form. Cuticles face the same direction and length of hair is slightly different and comes in layers to ensure the most natural look. This fact causes wigs and hair extensions made of this hair to be of top quality. Hair is naturally moving, flows naturally and retains natural qualities, glow, softness and natural texture.
